snippet: Mr. Bush was inundated with a pail of cold water by Laura Bush, as the former president to takes part in the fund-raising challenge sweeping the country.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bush was inundated with a pail of cold water by Laura Bush, as the former president to takes part in the fund-raising challenge sweeping the country.

headline.main: Soaked for A.L.S., George W. Bush Nominates Bill Clinton for a Bucketful
headline.print_headline: Soaked for A.L.S., George W. Bush Nominates Bill Clinton for a Bucketful
